thread.title: Warning: No Humans Allowed in This Virtual Community

author: Anne Kadet
title: Warning: No Humans Allowed in This Virtual Community
text:
It was bound to happen sooner than later, and now it is here—a social networking app for pets. Yes, on Petzbe, a virtual community that launched in March, user profiles feature selfies and comments from the pet’s perspective. The tagline: “No humans allowed.”
So what are pets doing on Petzbe?
They are taking naps and begging for treats....
